articles.author: Nathaniel Popper
articles.title: Internet giants, defied by Bitcoin, now see its tech as a remedy
articles.description: Last week, Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey said last week that he hoped to fund the creation of software for social media that shift power toward users and outside programmers, similar to bitcoin.
articles.content:
SAN FRANCISCO — Not so long ago, the technology behind bitcoin was seen in Silicon Valley as the best hope for challenging the enormous, centralized power of companies like Twitter and Facebook.
Now, in an unexpected twist, the internet giants think that tec… [+7897 chars]

articles.author: Andrew E. Kramer
articles.title: With Prisoner Swap, Ukraine’s President Inches Toward Peace
articles.description: Among those traded were riot police officers accused of killing protesters during mass demonstrations in Kyiv in 2014.
articles.content: Some prisoners held by Ukraine declined to take part in a trade that would have sent them to live in the isolated, repressive separatist enclaves in the east known as the peoples republics, preferring to serve out their sentences in Ukraine instead. Ukrainian… [+995 chars]
